altTitles.ja: りんく！らいふ！ラブライブ！104期

description.en: Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!
Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!

Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”
description.ja: 早藤香沙音はファミレスで働くアオヤマさんに会いに行くことを生きがいにしている。ある日、香沙音は雨の中で佇むアオヤマさんを助けることに。すると彼女は唐突に姉妹契約をもちかけてきて――。

altTitles.ja: 夢でフラれてはじまる百合

altTitles.en: Our Yuri Started with Me Getting Rejected in a Dream

altTitles.id: Kisah Yuri Kita Berawal Dari Diriku yang Ditolak di Dalam Mimpi

altTitles.en: Yuri That Starts With Getting Rejected In a Dream

altTitles.fr: Notre histoire commença lorsque ma confession fut rejetée dans mes rêves

altTitles.zh: 从梦里被拒绝开始的百合

altTitles.fr: Notre relation Yuri a commencé lorsque ma confession s'est fait rejeter dans mes rêves.
Notre histoire saphique commença lorsque ma déclaration amoureuse ne fut pas réciproque dans mon rêve

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

description.en: NES, PlayStation, Sega Saturn...High school girls today, fascinated by the retro games that once captivated the world, passionately discuss their passion for games! Will it be rivalry or friendship that develops between them?!

title.en: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

altTitles.ja: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

description.en:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.vi:
Tình tiết xoay quanh 3 thanh niên rảnh rỗi của câu lạc bộ SKET (chuyên giải quyết mọi rắc rối cho người khác):
- 1 nam thanh niên ngáo ngơ, chỉ thông minh lúc full trang bị.
- 1 nữ thanh niên lực lưỡng, trâu chó nhất bản đồ.
- 1 nam thanh niên Otaku chỉ nói chuyện qua laptop.

Bao gồm những câu chuyện dở khóc dở cười mà cười có khi rớt hàm mà khóc thì có khi lụt nhà -  và còn chứa rất nhiều oxi drama hít hà bổ phổi (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en:
Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in — a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—?! 

A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!
description.ja:
**一筋縄ではいかない先輩にペースが乱される!? 一途な青春ラブコメ！**

伊月くんには気になる先輩がいる。それは――風紀委員長の凛々子先輩！
彼女と少しでも話すために、わざと制服を着崩してみたりと努力を重ねる伊月だが、凛々子は何枚も上手で――!?
つい応援したくなる一途な青春ラブコメ開幕！
description.pt-br: Itsuki-kun está interessado em alguém... Sua veterana, Ririko-senpai, a presidente do comitê disciplinar! Em seus esforços para falar com ela, ele propositalmente bagunça seu uniforme, mas Ririko está sempre um passo à frente-?!Uma comédia romântica juvenil, comovente e dedicada começa!

title.en: The Delicate and Noble Concubine Has Lots of Tricks, and the Emperor Does Not Flirt With Her

altTitles.zh: Jiao Jiao Guifei Shouduan Gao, Huangdi Bu Jing Liao
娇娇贵妃手段高，皇帝不经撩

description.en: The self-disciplined and cold-faced emperor x the charming and seductive cannon fodder imperial concubine. The daughter of a billionaire group turned into a cannon fodder in a book. She wanted to survive, but unexpectedly she fell into the extreme favor of the cold-faced emperor, sinking step by step, and became the most favored concubine in the six palaces. Let's see how the charming imperial concubine won the palace fight and moved the emperor's heartstrings.

title.en: Kimi to Ikirareru Nara Shindemo Ii

altTitles.ja: 君と生きられるなら死んでもいい

description.en:
"I can't remember someone important who was always beside me."

Houri, who lives a very ordinary life, is drawn to a crosswalk and almost gets run over by a truck, but is saved by a man who passes by.
The moment he sees the man's face, he has flashbacks of his past life, in which the two of them were intimate.
The two are led by a super-powerful fate to make love, but the next morning, the man declares that he doesn't remember Houri...!?
A story of love that returns until death do them part.

description.ar: لقد قتلت من قبل الخونة وبعد أن عدت . قررت هذه المرة أن أكون صداقة معهم . . لأنه إذا أصبحت صديقه لهم ، فلن يقتلوني . لكن " هل يمكنك فقط السماح لي بالذهاب عندما ينتهي الأمر لقد أملت رأسي وسألت ، لكن العيون المحدقة بي قد تعمقت بعطش مجهول " ماذا يمكنني أن أفعل ؟ ليس لدي أي نية لترككِ تذهبين . " ردود الفعل هذه غريبة نوعا ما ؟ "
description.en: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.
description.fr: Arabella est la princesse oubliée et maladive qui vomit du sang dès qu'elle bouge. Elle revient après avoir été tuée lors d'une rébellion contre l'oppression de la famille impériale dirigée par celui qui a hérité du sang du dragon. Elle doit survivre jusqu'à son 25e anniversaire pour s'assurer que sa régression est terminée. Arabella décide de trouver une réponse auprès des rebelles afin de prolonger sa vie.
description.it: Arabella è una principessa dimenticata che vomita sangue ogni volta che si muove. Dopo essere stata uccisa durante la ribellione contro l'oppressione della famiglia imperiale, ritorna al tempo prima del suo ventesimo compleanno. Rendendosi conto che deve sopravvivere fino al suo 25° compleanno per fermare il ciclo di regressione, Arabella decide di cercare un modo per curare la sua malattia, anche se questo significa cercare risposte dalle stesse forze ribelli.
description.ko:
움직이면 피를 토하는 잊혀진 찬밥 황녀 아라벨라. 
드래곤의 피를 이어받은 황실의 압제에 맞서 일어나는 반란 사건 때 죽임을 당한 후 회귀한다. 
자신이 25살의 생일까지 살아남아야 회귀가 끝난다는 것을 알게 된 
아라벨라는 생명 연장을 위해 반란군에게서 답을 찾기로 결심한다.
description.pt: Arabella é uma princesa esquecida que vomita sangue sempre que se move. Depois de ser morta durante a rebelião contra a opressão da família imperial, ela retorna à época anterior ao seu 20º aniversário. Percebendo que deve sobreviver até seu 25º aniversário para interromper o ciclo de regressão, Arabella decide buscar uma forma de curar sua doença, mesmo que isso signifique buscar respostas das próprias forças rebeldes.
description.vi:
Arabella là một cô công chúa bị lãng quên, luôn nôn ra máu khi di chuyển. Một cuộc nổi loạn đã diễn ra để chống lại sự áp bức bóc lột của hoàng gia. Về sau khi bị giết chết liên tiếp, cô phát hiện ra rằng quá trình trở về quá khứ sẽ chỉ kết thúc nếu cô sống sót cho đến sinh nhật thứ 25 của mình
.
Arabella quyết tâm tìm ra câu trả lời từ phe nổi dậy để kéo dài sự sống.
description.zh-hk:
阿拉貝拉，是一位因為體弱容易吐血而被遺忘受冷落的公主。

在受繼承龍族血統的皇室壓迫而發生的叛亂事件的時候，遭遇死亡之後復活。

明白自己到25歲的生日復活就結束的阿拉貝拉，決心為了延續生命從叛軍那裡尋找答案。

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.en: The Family Circumstances of the Unreliable Witch

altTitles.ja: でこぼこ魔女の親子事情

altTitles.pt-br: As circunstâncias familiares da bruxa irregular

description.en: A witch who lives alone in the forest picks up a child. 16 years later, she grows up bigger than expected.
description.pt-br: Alyssa é uma bruxa que vive sozinha na floresta, e num certo dia encontra uma bebê humana. Apesar do desafio, ela dá o nome de "Viola" à criança e decide criá-la. 16 anos depois, Viola cresceu muito mais do que Alissa jamais imaginou... Mas espere, ela cresceu demais! E assim começa a caótica comédia de uma mãe e uma filha com aparências invertidas!

title.en: I Raised the Prince to Be Blackened

altTitles.zh: Wo Ba Huangzi Yang Hei Huale

description.en: Feng Yufei conscientiously did the system task - humiliating the male lead to stimulate his fighting spirit and let him ascend to the position of Ninth Five Lord. Unexpectedly, he missed the arrow at the beginning, and saved the male lead from the opponent, and became the little sun in the male lead's heart. Since then, all missions have gone off track...

In the forest, the young girl met a cheerful demon with a candle head.

"Why are you alone? Why are you so filthy?"
"...Your flames are pretty."

"Eh? I like you. Form a contract with me."

What awaited the girl was a warm meal and a soft bed-?!
The crazy demon, Candle, and the mysterious girl, Little Mum, begin their strange life together.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Ossan Healer and the Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-Aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

description.en:
Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs. But he will persist through many harsh battles to make Futura a better place to live!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)

♥ Support: patreon.com/teknomanga
♥ Animated Trailer: youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf

description.de:
Wie weit würdest du gehen, um die Person zu stürzen, die du am meisten hasst? Ohne Haus, ohne Job und mit nichts mehr zu verlieren, ist Geunyeong Lee bereit, alles zu riskieren, um den K-Pop-Superstar Whojoon zu Fall zu bringen. Aber nachdem die beiden sich erst einmal richtig kennengelernt haben, erweist sich ihr Vorhaben plötzlich als schwieriger als gedacht. Wird sie an ihrem Plan festhalten, ihn ein für alle Mal zu ruinieren, nachdem sie die Wahrheit über den Mann hinter dem Popstar erfährt?

---

description.en:
A romance between famous K-pop star WhoJoon and his official anti-fan reporter Lee Geun-Young who end up cohabitating…!

---
How far would you go to take down the person you hate most? With no house, no job, and nothing left to lose, Geunyeong Lee is willing to risk it all to bring down the country’s national treasure, Korean superstar Who Joon. But once the two really get to know each other, bringing him down suddenly becomes a lot harder. Will she be able to ruin him once and for all after she learns the truth about the man behind the popstar?

---

description.es:
Ahora una serie popular de acción real. ¿Hasta dónde dejarías que te lleve el odio? Geunyeong Lee ya no tiene trabajo ni casa, pero está dispuesta a arriesgar lo poco que le queda con tal de arruinarle la vida a Hoo Joon, el ídolo favorito del país. Sin embargo, todo se complica una vez que Geunyeong empieza a conocer al hombre que hay detrás de la fachada... Después de descubrir la verdad, ¿será capaz de seguir con su plan?

description.ko:
누구나 한 번쯤 상상하는 일이 이루어졌다. 
세계적인 K-POP 톱스타와의 24시간 밀착 동거. 
그러나…… 나는 그의 안티팬이다!.. 

--

잡지사 [원더우먼] 피처팀 3년차 기자, 이근영.  
진정한 '원더우먼'을 꿈꾸며 입사했지만 현실은 온갖 잡다구리한 일만 하는, 일명 ‘포스트잇 기자’다. 


첫 단독 취재를 노리고 근영이 향한 곳은 클럽 ‘베니’ 오픈식. 
그곳에 K-POP 역사를 새롭게 쓰고 있는 데뷔 6년 차 톱스타, 후준이 온다는 소식에  
근영은 특종을 노리고 후준만을 기다리다 뜻밖의 장면을 목격한다.  
바로 여자 화장실 앞에서 느닷없이 나타난 후준이 어떤 여자에게 따귀를 날리는 게 아닌가! 
그 뜻밖의 시추에이션에 하필 근영이 들고 있던 건 사진기자 수환이 맡긴 카메라.   
그런데, 그게 화근이었다. 간당간당했던 기자 생활에 종말을 맞이하게 된 것은. 

막무가내 취재로 오해한 후준은 근영이 안고 있던 카메라를 빼앗아 던지고,  
흥분한 근영은 후준에게 따지려다 그의 발에 오바이트를 한다.  


클럽 오픈식에서 걸쭉한(?) 사고를 낸 다음날, 근영은 갑자기 잡지사에서 잘린다.  
그리고 그 배후에 후준이 있다는 것을 알게 된 근영은 후준과의 전면전을 선포한다. 
이제 근영에게 남은 건 흉하게 공개된 얼굴과 ‘후준의 미친 안티팬’이란 낙인뿐.  


갑작스런 실직도 모자라 늘어나는 카드빚으로 월세 집에서도 쫓겨나게 생긴 근영.  
그런 그녀에게 갑자기 내려온 동아줄! 바로 리얼리티 예능 프로그램의 출연이다. 
그런데… 상대가 누구라고? 거기서 왜 또 후준이 나와?! 
이 인간, 가까이서 보니 모니터 속 모습과 사생활이 완전 식스센스 반전급이다.  
그래, 이 인간의 이중생활을 이제 정말 낱낱이 파헤쳐주겠다!

---

description.pt-br:
Um romance entre o famoso astro do K-pop Hoo Joon e sua repórter oficial anti-fãs Lee Geun-Young, que acabam coabitando...!

Até onde você iria para derrubar a pessoa que você mais odeia? Sem casa, sem emprego e sem nada a perder, Geunyeong Lee está disposta a arriscar tudo para derrubar o tesouro nacional do país, o superastro coreano Hoo Joon. Mas quando os dois realmente se conhecem, derrubá-lo de repente se torna muito mais difícil. Será que ela conseguirá acabar com ele de uma vez por todas depois de descobrir a verdade sobre o homem por trás do popstar?

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved Into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is… me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols."

His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber.
His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress.

Souma’s university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols…
But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!?

Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol…

A harem romantic comedy under one roof with unpredictable idols begins!

Source: [Amazon JP](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4824006686)

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

title.en: Wasn't this supposed to be a strategy game?

description.en:
I’ve possessed a hidden character in a notorious strategy game with a 0% clear rate.
To escape this game, I must bring peace to the empire…
“So, from now on, I’ll trust only you, Priest.”
“You’d better give up on that plan.”
“Priest, did you really use me?”
“For some reason, I feel something special from you, Priest.”
“You promised you’d come back.”
…Why is my favorability rising, and why does it feel like this is turning into a reverse harem?
Excuse me, wasn’t this supposed to be a strategy game?

In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that. Until he met her. Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ja: 何もない町、変わるはずもない日々の中で、高校生の黒瀬令児（くろせれいじ）は、“ただ”生きていた。家族、将来の夢、幼馴染。そのどれもが彼をこの町に縛り付けている。このまま“ただ”生きていく、そう思っていた。彼女に出会うまでは――。生きることに希望はあるのか。この先に光はあるのか。
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

title.en: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.uk: Годі з мене чоловіка - йду заробляти гроші

altTitles.zh: 要什么老公，我只想搞钱

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.es-la: Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero

description.en:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

altTitles.ja: かさねがさねの初恋ですが

altTitles.vi: Tình Đầu, Lại Thêm Tình Đầu

description.en: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: It Turns Out That I Have Been Invincible For A Long Time

altTitles.en: I've Been Invincible For A Long Time

description.en: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

altTitles.ja-ro: At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

The criminal underworld speaks of a hitman bearing incredible skill...this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? Because it happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.

Internationally wanted hitman, codenamed Jesus, fakes his death using the body of his exact double, high school teacher Shingo Fujisawa. A much bigger problem is at play, as Fujisawa's family is unaware of his death (via cardiac arrest), leading to Jesus taking up the name and profession of his much more legally-sound doppelganger. When the mafia and international agents start showing up in Japan, Jesus must do everything in his power to keep his newfound family, peers, and students safe, all while his opponents pray for mercy!


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Sorao, an ordinary student, meets Mojacko and Donmo, two aliens looking for a companion for a journey to space. He agrees to come with them, and goes on a fun, yet dangerous, adventure through space, and visit different planets.

Keita has two step-sisters (without blood-relation) who love him in a lustful way and have no problems expressing it, they even like to compete over it; much to the laughs of his friends (which he usually endures without problems). One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.
description.it: La storia di Kissxsis inizia con lo studente Keita Suminoe alle prese con gli esami di ingresso per le scuole superiori. Ad aiutarlo ci sono le sue sorelle gemelle più grandi di lui. Le ragazze, Ako e Riko, non hanno alcun legame di sangue con Keita, non fanno nulla per nascondere i propri sentimenti amorosi nei confronti del ragazzo, e si lasciano andare a effusioni ed avances anche in pubblico. I genitori dei tre ragazzi incoraggiano Keita ad accettare le attenzioni di una delle due sorelle, e Keita nonostante l'imbarazzo non disdegna l'interesse delle due ragazze nei suoi confronti. Ako e Riko, nonostante siano tecnicamente rivali fra loro, sono spesso unite e complici nell'escogitare piani per allontanare Keita da qualunque altra ragazza possa girare intorno a lui…
description.pt: Kiss x Sis conta a história de Keita Suminoe, um jovem estudante do ensino fundamental. Ele está vivendo em uma casa com seus pais e suas meio-irmãs gêmeas, Ako e Riko, que o beijam e o assediam sempre competindo para ver quem mostra mais amor por ele. Embora se considerem irmãos eles não compartilham relação sanguínea; seus pais se casaram enquanto eles estavam na infância. Ainda assim, a relação incomoda Keita profundamente, já que seus pais permitem essa relação, e visto que foram criados juntos, e escandaliza à grande parte dos que vêm a saber desta. As gêmeas, contudo, são insistentes, e fazem o possível e o impossível para ficar com ele. Nessa conjuntura, entram outros personagens que possuem esse mesmo interesse, e a trama se desenrola em cima da disputa por Keita.
description.pt-br: Keita tem duas meias-irmãs (sem parentesco) que o amam de uma forma lasciva e não têm problemas em expressar isso, elas até gostam de competir por isso; para as risadas de seus amigos (o que ele geralmente suporta sem problemas). Um dia, elas vêm à escola dele para lhe dar seu almoço, ele fica irritado devido à atmosfera e explode com elas, para contra-atacar sua raiva, elas confessam seus sentimentos ternos por ele na frente de todos e vão embora. Sentindo pena, ele corre atrás delas e diz que vai estudar muito para entrar na mesma escola que elas.

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

title.en: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

altTitles.en: Max-Level Green Tea Transmigrates Into Little Pitiful One

altTitles.zh-ro: Man Ji Lvcha Chuan Cheng Xiao Kelian
Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián

altTitles.en: Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf

description.en:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
description.fr:
Lin Feilu est une actrice oscarisée. Faire la mignonne, médire, feindre l'innocence ou jouer les innocentes. Peu importe, elle n’est pas quelqu'un de bien. Elle meurt le jour de son 27e anniversaire en se jurant que si elle a une prochaine vie, elle serait une bonne personne. Elle se réincarne en une princesse de cinq ans de la grande dynastie Dalin. Sa mère, concubine impériale n'était pas favorisée parce son frère aîné souffrait d'une déficience mentale.
Lin Feilu, bien que déterminée à rester une bonne personne, va utiliser ses talents de manipulatrice pour retourner la situation de sa famille.

description.en:
Today, as always, the girls practice with both humor and seriousness.
Through table tennis, they deepen their bond.
A high school story about real, everyday table tennis!!

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.
